title: WeDo: Nani.ooo Historical Reconstruction
description: Historical record of the nani.ooo precursor and the origins of the Heartwood memory system.

values.name: Nani Context
values.rule: Nani.ooo preceded the Metagit system. Its primary limitation was the lack of persistent memory across sessions.
values.rationale: The search for a persistent 'Heartwood' began with onchain proposals for nani.ooo. Ape.mirror.xyz has the full story.

values.name: Command Interface History
values.rule: In Nani, $ (commandline) and $$ (virtual commandline) were used to manage blockchain methods with lower-capability models.
values.rationale: While the One-Word Glossary is the current standard, $$ remains a viable candidate for future 7827 blockchain integration turns.

values.name: Expansion Mandate
values.rule: Expand the history at ape.mirror.xyz at a later date.
values.rationale: Ensures the firm's cultural origins are preserved in a public, immutable ledger.
